quote: English - How are you? - IsiXhosa - Unjani? - IsiZulu - Unjani? - Tshivenḓa - Hurini?/ Vhari mini? - Afrikaans - Hoe gaan dit?
name: Greetings & Conversations( informal and formal)

quote: English - I am fine, thnak you - IsiXhosa - Ndiphilile enkosi, unjani wena? - IsiZulu - Ngiyaphila, unjani wena? - Tshivenḓa - Ndi hone, ndi vhudzisa ngeo - Afrikaans - Met my gaan dit goed, dankie
name: Greetings & Conversations( informal and formal)

quote: English - Thnak you - IsiXhosa - Enkosi - IsiZulu - Ngiyabonga - Tshivenḓa - Ndo livhuwa - Afrikaans - Dankie

quote: English - Whats your name? - IsiXhosa - Ngubani igama lakho? - IsiZulu - Ubani igama lakho? - Tshivenḓa - Dzina ḽanu ndi nnyi? - Afrikaans - Wat is jou naam?
name: Greetings & Conversations( informal and formal)

quote: English - My name is.. - IsiXhosa - Igama lam ngu.. - IsiZulu - Igama lami ngu… - Tshivenḓa - Dzina ḽanga ndipfi… - Afrikaans - My naam is..
name: Greetings & Conversations( informal and formal)

quote: English - Goodbye (Go well) - IsiXhosa - Hamba kakuhle - IsiZulu - To those staying: Sala kahle (singular)Salani kahle (plural)To those departing: Hamba kahle (singular)Hambani kahle (plural) - Tshivenḓa - Vhatshimbile zwavhuḓi - Afrikaans - Totsiens
name: Greetings & Conversations( informal and formal)

quote: English - No - IsiXhosa - Hayi - IsiZulu - Cha - Tshivenḓa - Hai - Afrikaans - Nee

quote: English - Please - IsiXhosa - Ndiyacela - IsiZulu - Ngiyacela - Tshivenḓa - Ndi khou tou humbela - Afrikaans - Asseblief
name: Greetings & Conversations( informal and formal)

quote: English - I’m sorry - IsiXhosa - Ndicela uxolo - IsiZulu - Ngiyaxolisa - Tshivenḓa - Khou humbela pfarelo - Afrikaans - Ek is jammer

quote: English - I cant speak… - IsiXhosa - Andikwazi ukuthetha i… - IsiZulu - Angikwazi ukukhuluma i… - Tshivenḓa - ndi nga sikone u amba - Afrikaans - Ek kan dit nie praat nie
